message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
Iterator<String> iterator = list.iterator();
MediaPlayer player = new MediaPlayer(new Media(iterator.next()));
player.setOnEndOfMedia(new Runnable() {
    @Override
    public void run() {
        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
            player = new MediaPlayer(new Media(iterator.next()));
            player.play();
        }
    }
});
player.play();
<<<explanation>>>: You can use an Iterator to go through your list of songs. When one song ends, check if there is a next song in the list. If there is, create a new MediaPlayer with the next song and play it. If there isn't, do nothing. This will play all the songs in the list one after the other.
